title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When deleting a working set, the package view in the background immediately refilters. This behavior should be changed so that refiltering only occurs when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating the working sets. Additionally, pressing cancel should revert all changes made to the working sets, including canceling the remove operation.
OB: At the moment of deleting a working set, the package view in the background immediately refilters.
EB: Refiltering should only happen when closing the working set selection dialog, not while manipulating the working sets. Pressing cancel should cancel all changes made to the working sets, including canceling the remove operation.
SR: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered accordingly. 2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set.
